abstract: In the latest DealBook Portrait video, Laurence Fink of BlackRock talks about his fallout with Blackstone’s Stephen Schwarzman, his failed attempts to get a job at Goldman Sachs and his early trading stumble.
snippet: In the latest DealBook Portrait video, Laurence Fink of BlackRock talks about his fallout with Blackstone’s Stephen Schwarzman, his failed attempts to get a job at Goldman Sachs and his early trading stumble.
lead_paragraph: Laurence D. Fink has come along way since his days working in his family’s shoe store in California.

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Mac William Bishop
